basic.color: Flower color green, purple, red, white, yellow, blue

maintenance.soil: No need be cultivated in soil or water, suitable for growing in air
maintenance.sunlight: Put in places with warm sunlight
maintenance.watering: Spray water on leaves daily, water twice in the morning and afternoon in summer
maintenance.fertilization: May apply diluted (at 25% recommanded concentration) liquid fertilizers on leaves once a month
maintenance.pruning: Remove aged tissues, dead, rotten, diseased leaves timely
